I'll be reshuffling the Cabinet today. Watch this Twitter feed for the very latest. #Reshuffle.
PM Olmert Meets with German Foreign Minister http://t.co/C57Pg5XGhw
Eagles meets the deputies of Karak governorate in the presence of a ministerial team http://t.co/rnLMLgtxw5
Confirming: William Hague to become Leader of the House of Commons. He remains First Secretary of State. #Reshuffle.
Ken Clarke has been a political Titan for more than a generation. His wise and trenchant views will be missed around the Cabinet table.
Philip Hammond is the new Foreign Secretary.
Michael Gove is Commons Chief Whip. He'll have an enhanced role in campaigning and doing broadcast media interviews. #Reshuffle.
Nicky Morgan is the new Education Secretary and continues as Minister for Women and Equalities.
Liz Truss is the new Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs.
Michael Fallon is the new Secretary of State for Defence. #Reshuffle
46.7 million pounds collected in cash accounts for Soma, the loss of his life to the family of 301 miners 154 thousand 450 pounds to be distributed.
We will provide scholarships to our 389 children, including newborns, in Soma through our foundations and associations throughout their education life.
CHP General Manager, who says, "You will go to the electorate like you are a man like a man," and he is making a dictatorial appeal to us.
Esther McVey continues as Minister for Employment and Disabilities. She will now attend Cabinet. #Reshuffle
Greg Clark is Minister for Science and Universities and Minister of State at the Cabinet Office. He will attend all Cabinets. #Reshuffle
Lord Hill is to be my nomination for European Commissioner.
Stephen Crabb is to be the new Secretary of State for Wales. #Reshuffle
Baroness Tina Stowell is the new Leader of the House of Lord and Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster. #Reshuffle
Jeremy Wright is the new Attorney General. #Reshuffle
Matt Hancock is the new Minister of State for Business, Enterprise and Energy. He'll attend Cabinet. #Reshuffle
Miqati and Merkel to congratulate Merkel on victory of German team http://t.co/EuXxkQ6IdQ http://t.co/sbU3sp4cSG
Mark Harper is returning to Government as Minister of State at the Department for Work and Pensions. #Reshuffle
Mike Penning is the new Minister of State at the Home Office and Ministry of Justice. He'll have responsibility for the police. #Reshuffle
Nick Boles is Minister of State for the Business & Education depts.  Part of his brief will be equal marriage implementation. #Reshuffle
David Gauke is promoted to Financial Secretary to the Treasury. #Reshuffle
Terrible accident in the #Moscow #Metro. My most sincere condolences. I wish the victims health and strength in this tragedy
John Hayes becomes Minister of State at Transport, while continuing his role as Cabinet Office Minister. #Reshuffle
Anna Soubry is promoted to Minister of State at the Ministry of Defence. #Reshuffle
Oliver Letwin remains Minister for Government Policy and becomes Lord Privy Seal. #Reshuffle
Clare Perry becomes Parliamentary Under Secretary of State at the Department for Transport. #Reshuffle
Priti Patel becomes Exchequer Secretary at the Treasury. #Reshuffle

Today, we have concluded the campaign of Suqaya_Emirates with a great success, with a total of Dhs180 million being collected for more than 7 million people around the world.
All thanks to everyone who contributed, presented and supported the systems of Sakaya_Emirates and all thanks to the teams in the field that completed drilling wells in many areas
We launched a global award of US $ 1 million to create sustainable and innovative solar water purification and desalination solutions.
We also announced the establishment of the UAE-based research firm Suqaya, which will specialize in the search for sustainable solutions to provide clean water using solar energy.
# Suqaya_Emirates is a good shed, mercy, blessing and a life blessing for millions of people .. We ask God to accept from everyone in this blessed month
We concluded #UAEWaterAid campaign today with great success marked by raising AED 180M to provide drinking water for 7M humans worldwide
Thanks to every contribution, support & organizing effort towards #UAEWaterAid & to the field team who already built wells in many areas
Today we launched a USD 1M prize to find sustainable & innovative solutions to purify & desalinate water using solar power #UAEWaterAid
We also announced establishing #UAEWaterAid foundation to find sustainable solutions and provide clean water using solar power
#UAEWaterAid provides a basic human need for millions of people around the world and reflects our commitment towards humanity everywhere
